alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 7:59PM EDT until August 21 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 759 PM EDT, Thunderstorms produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Elyria, North Ridgeville and Avon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
